artist: Ilonka Karasz; Paye & Baker Manufacturing Company, 1901-1935
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Set includes teapot, creamer, sugar bowl.
text:
In addition to Art Deco designs in silver, ceramics, textiles, and furniture, Ilonka Karasz contributed illustrations for the cover of <I>New Yorker Magazine<I> for more than thirty years beginning around 1940.  

A mahogany desk Karasz designed for herself is currently on view in Gallery 378, located on this same floor in the Target Wing.
title: Tea pot from a tea set
